about_the_game:
This bundle contains:

  • 7 days of WoT Premium Account
  • 500 gold

Bundle Description:

Boost your progress with seven days of WoT Premium Account and get 500 gold for your needs! The Premium & Gold: Light Pack will come in handy to both beginners and experienced World of Tanks players.

WoT Premium Account has a lot of benefits that make the game even more enjoyable:

  • Bonuses: Premium Account provides a +50% bonus to Combat XP, Crew XP, and credits earned in battle.
  • Applicable modifier to XP: Apply an additional ×3 multiplier to XP earned in your latest victorious Random Battle five times per day.
  • Reserve Stock: Receive an extra bonus of up to 750,000 credits within seven days. Also, a 10% bonus to credits earned goes into a special vault.
  • Premium missions: Owners of WoT Premium Account will have the opportunity to fulfill a series of three simple daily missions.
  • Platoon bonus: In a Platoon, WoT Premium Account holders receive a 15% credit bonus. Also, fellow Platoon members who are not holders receive a 10% bonus.
  • You also receive one more slot for excluded maps.

DLC can be added to your World of Tanks account only once.
You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 4550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Desktop)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
